Package com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts

Class CurrencyAccount

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts.Account
com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts.CurrencyAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CurrencyAccount extends Account
Class representing a currency account. Extends the Account class.

  • Constructor Details

    • CurrencyAccount

      public CurrencyAccount(String accountNumber, Customer customer, Date openedDate, BigDecimal initialBalance, String currencyCode)
      Constructor initializing a currency account with specified values.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number
      customer - the customer who owns the account
      openedDate - the date when the account was opened
      initialBalance - the initial balance of the account
      currencyCode - the currency code of the account

  • Method Details

    • getCreditLimit

      public BigDecimal getCreditLimit()
      Returns the credit limit of the account. Currency accounts do not have a credit limit, so this method returns null.
      Specified by:
      getCreditLimit in class Account
      Returns:
      null
